Description: This table contains information about the health and safety inspections conducted at various restaurants. It includes columns such as the inspection date, type of violation,Indicator of critical violation(critical_flag),Violation description(violation_description),Total score for a particular inspection(score), Grade associated with the inspection(grade), and the restaurant's name(dba), borough(boro) and cuisine_description. Useful for queries about restaurant safety ratings and compliance.\

This table Links restaurants to their menus and includes basic restaurant info like cuisine type and address. Helpful for finding restaurants by cuisine or location.. Foreign key: restaurant_id -> restaurant_menu.restaurant_id.\

This table provides a comprehensive compilation of menu items and price sourced from various restaurants. Each row represents a distinct dish, with details including its name and price. Good for queries about food items and prices at specific restaurants that are listed in 'restaurants_has_menu'. Foreign key: restaurant_id.\

This table contains reviews of restaurants, including the review title, the date of the review, the review text, and the 'restaurant_id' column.Useful for sentiment analysis and customer feedback queries. Foreign key: restaurant_id -> restaurants_has_reviews.id.\

This table contains information about restaurants that have reviews in 'restaurant_reviews' table. It also provide overall review for a restaurant(the 'rating' column). It includes details such as the id('id' -> restaurant_reviews.restaurant_id), restaurant's name,restaurant's city, the price range, restaurant cuisine('type') and the restaurant's overall review('rating'). Note: This table doesn't contain the actual reviews - those are in 'restaurant_reviews' table. Good for general restaurant review queries and price range filtering.\

this table including Name, Address, Review Count, Phone, Average Review, food review, service review,ambience review,value review, Price Range, Star 1-5 (%) counts, Restaurant Main Type(cuisine), Latitude, and Longitude. you can also get the restaurant rating based on average reviews and star counts. Useful for comprehensive restaurant queries.\

This table contains over 7,000 records of restaurant reviews in New York. The dataset comprises several key entities, including restaurant titles(name),number of reviews, reviews or comments(review_comment), popular foods, category(cuisine), and whether online delivery is available or not. Note: Can be joined with other tables using restaurant name (title). Good for queries about popular dishes and online ordering\

This table contains information about users who have reviewed restaurants. It includes details such as the user's id, user's name and user's location.Useful for user-specific queries and demographic analysis.\
